abstract: John Williams reviews books You Are Having a Good Time: Stories by Amie Barrodale, Ninety-Nine Stories of God by Joy Williams, A Meal in Winter: A Novel of World War II by Hubert Mingarelli and Brightfellow: A Novel by Rikki Ducornet.
lead_paragraph: A short-story collection; an assortment of vignettes; a novel set in World War II; and a story whose protagonist hides out in a college are recent offerings.

headline.main: Books by Amie Barrodale, Joy Williams, Hubert Mingarelli and Rikki Ducornet
headline.print_headline: Books by Amie Barrodale, Joy Williams, Hubert Mingarelli and Rikki Ducornet
